text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem swallow-screen-time-cs

This case-insensitive code system http://testSK.org/CodeSystem/swallow-screen-time-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
T4H Within 4 hoursScreening performed within 4 hours of symptom onset.
T24H Within 24 hoursScreening performed within 24 hours of symptom onset (but after 4h).
A24H After 24 hoursScreening performed after 24 hours of symptom onset.
UNK Unknown timeScreening performed but timing relative to symptom onset unknown.

name: SwallowScreenTimeCS
title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category Code System
description: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.

concept.definition: Screening performed within 4 hours of symptom onset.
Screening performed within 24 hours of symptom onset (but after 4h).
Screening performed after 24 hours of symptom onset.
Screening performed but timing relative to symptom onset unknown.
